tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Overall, I didn\'t mind his class. It was on an interesting subject and sometimes I felt like I learned a lot. However, I really did not like the tests he gave us. There were multiple subjects we spent entire class periods on that never came up on test but then there would be multiple questions on tangent related topics that we barley talked about.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Tierney is a great professor that wants his students to succeed. He really cares for each individual student and challenges the class to engage and provide supporting arguments. Fun times with Tierney

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Great Professor! I recommend his Sustainability class. His test questions are easy to understand and he doesn\'t try to trick you. We did two presentations and some reading. His lectures are interesting and he has a lot of energy. He tried to make the class enjoyable for students.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: This honestly was the best class I have had at the University level. Tierney pushes you to think critically about current issues, the class is difficult, but completely worth it as you actually learn

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He is a good teacher who is very interested in the subjects he teaches. His enthusiasm rubs off on the class and makes it more exciting. It\'s a hard class because there aren\'t very many points possible so it\'s necessary to do pretty well on everything to do well in his class. His tests come straight from his lectures so take good notes.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Very knowledgeable teacher. Also very egocentric. He lectures like he\'s speaking to kindergartners. Lectures are also politically driven. Class is less about geography than it is him spewing his personal agenda.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He is a great teacher and he is incredibly passionate about the subject i would highly recommend any class he teaches. However, i was a little disappointed this quarter because he stopped teaching halfway through and now we have an incredibly boring lady who just drones on for two hours. but that\'s why the invented laptops.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Sean is an exceleent teacher. He does teach very very fast but its also a fun challenge. The material is very thought provoking and Extremlely interesting. NOt your everyday geography course. Talks about environmental, governmental, social, and economical topics of each continent. TAKE HIM. NO HW. No Papers. OVERAL GREAT CLASS. Very intersting

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: His foundations in geography class was great! If you\'re interested in current events, you\'ll enjoy this class. Also, we took a couple field trips during class that were very thought-provoking. This was a great foundations class since Sean encouraged discussion and put less emphasis on busy work.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I had him for intro to geography. He was very engaging, very interesting, and really made you think. Not the type of class you can just coast through, but if you show up every day and take notes you should be good to go.
